attributes.action: Introduce legislation to allow the prosecution of MP's found to be abusing, or making fraudulent expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call on the Prime Minister to address the public outrage regarding fraudulent expenses claims by MP's by legislating to allow these matters to be investigated by an independent body, not answerable to Parliament, nor made up of members of either house, nor civil servants. The legislation should include a mechanism whereby those MP's found to have claimed outwith the rules, should be subject to criminal proceedings for the offence, and civil proceeding for the recovery of the proceeds.
